name: Zombie1 Kenobi
text: We ordered 5 meats well done. It was PERFECTLY BAKED. Ready on time and generous amount of toppings perfectly toasted. Delicious. Nice workers as well. Couldn't ask for better customer service. We are traveling through. We are from Texas.

name: Amanda Hoover
text: The staff could have been a bit more friendly with their interactions. However, I have never gotten an incorrect order from here. This location is close to the highway. Which makes for a very convenient stop along my usual errand route. I suggest calling ahead for orders that involve more than the hot and ready menu.
